elements.text: How do I delete an environment? I want to do something like this

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
You can't do it from the Pkg REPL. You can just delete the files yourself.

elements.text: You can't do it from the Pkg REPL. You can just delete the files yourself.

text: note that in recent versions of Julia you can also activate throw-away environments with `]activate --temp` which will be deleted after you close the Julia session

elements.text: note that in recent versions of Julia you can also activate throw-away environments with
which will be deleted after you close the Julia session
